text: The 1974 European Karate Championships, the 7th edition of the European Karate Championships, was held in London, England, from May 2 to 4, 1974. ==Competition== {| |- | Kumite -68 kg | Richard Scherer | Antonio Oliva | Michel Bonhomme Jacques Bonvin |- | Kumite -78 kg | Billy Higgins | Geert Lemmens | |- | Kumite + 78 kg | Jan Kallenbach | Jean Luc Mami | Jean-Claude Knupferhttp://www.karate.ch/sport/archiv/rekorde-und-fakten/em-europacup/ Brian Fitkin |- | Open Kumite | Robin McFarlane | François Petitdemange | Lino La Cassia |- |} === Team === {| |- | Kumite | | | |} ==References== ==External links== *Karate Records - European Championship 1974 1974 Category:International sports competitions in London European Karate Championships European championships in 1974 European Karate Championships European Karate Championships Category:Karate competitions in the United Kingdom
title: 1974 European Karate Championships
